casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Fair, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Fair (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 396.]

(No. 94-1680 Submitted November 1, 1994 Decided December 30, 1994.) *397Michael Miller, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Joyce S. Anderson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Eddie J. Fair, pro se. Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
